extendedInfo.description: (A paid version "Droidsail Super App2SD Pro"is released, which removed ads and add one key "Move System Update App" to SD card (save even more space), and more batch operations. :)(ATTENTION: Some phone module / ROM version has disabled/damaged app2sd function in system level, the app may not work in this case!)Move more apps to SD card!!!  This is a super APP2SD tool for ROOTed user only (Android 2.2 and above), which could force move more apps (even those apps marked with internal only :) to SD card (or move back phone) and save more space than normal App2SD apps.   You can also perform batch move apps, set default install location of apps, clear cache with this app.   Simple is the best! :)System Requirement:1. A ROOTed phone;2. USB debugging enabled (Go to System Settings->Application->Developemnt->USB debugging);ATTENTION: Some app which has widget/alarm/wallpaper in using is not recommanded to be moved to SD card, which may cause problem.Features:1. List all movable apps;2. Move apps to SD card (even marked with internal only);3. Move apps back phone;4. Batch move apps (silent mode, user free);5. Set default install location of apps(Auto/Internal/SD Card);6. Show total/used/left space of phone or SD card;7. 1 tap to clear all app cache;8. Sort apps by name, size, install date;9. Run installed apps;10. Uninstall apps;11. View app on market;

reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
reviews.comment: I looked for this... A app which I choose multiple apps to move, and it does it for me. I tried about 8 apps, but they were all pretty much the exact same app, but reskinned. This actually works as I want it to. Thank you so much!
reviews.author: Dominik Rys

reviews.title: Unable to mave
reviews.comment: It\'s not moving any aap to my sd card and taking a lot of time.
reviews.author: Yousuf Don

reviews.title: Good but error
reviews.comment: It help me to save memory, but after I restart the mobile, the apps which I transfer to sd card will disappear and I should reinstall all of them. I have reinstall your app2sd app and try several times, the problem still occured, I am using Samsung Galaxy Note 1(GT-N7000) with android 4.1.2, thanks.
reviews.author: Chun Shing Aaron Lee

reviews.title: Am I doing something wrong?
reviews.comment: I checked off 5 apps to move and it says \"0 of 5\" and at 0% moved. It\'s stuck there and nothing happens.
reviews.author: Bill Podley

reviews.title: Galaxy s+
reviews.comment: Good make my memory more  free
reviews.author: Faiz Salleh

reviews.title: Doesn\'t detect sdcard properly
reviews.comment: Set sdcard to wrong location, can\'t install, can\'t change anything. Adb pm shell setInstallLocation doesn\'t fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Root
reviews.comment: No ROOT? Custom rom and am certainly rooted. Lg thrill cooked biohazard. Now trying to use it on a pan tech presto (burst) running slim bean. This trash Just will not work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: For those who can\'t get it to work...
reviews.comment: Make sure USB debugging is enabled on your phone, otherwise it won\'t work and will just get stuck at 0% when moving apps.
reviews.author: Tim Strachan

reviews.title: Great program
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it says it does, and does it well. No boat, and while it does run as a service so it can notify you of a new app install that can be moved, its memory footprint is small.
reviews.author: Justin Acklin

reviews.title: Hmmmm....
reviews.comment: Tired to try all app to move all data inside
reviews.author: fayza gusman

reviews.title: It was cool but there\'s something wrong
reviews.comment: It save my internal memory but after i reboot my phone...my application which moved to sd card is gone...please fix it...i use s advance (gt-I9070) with jelly bean 4.1.2 I\'ll give you 5 stars for the fixed version later
reviews.author: Arnold Difirst

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Too good, my task comleted. Moved facebook, twitter, whats up, chat on moved to sd card successfully. *****
reviews.author: Vishwanath Shingadi

reviews.title: This app is a waste of space!
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t do what it says on the tin as it won\'t move Apps to the external SD card on my 16GB Galaxy S II, but rather the so-called external memory that forms part of the 16GB on the device which is no good to me as I have a lot of Apps on my device which I want to move to my 32GB MicroSD card which has plenty of space for Apps!
reviews.author: Rune Jayce

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not work
reviews.comment: It\'s move app to internal \"limited\" usb storage not to sd card :(
reviews.author: Fathur Rifai

reviews.title: Dont wasre ur time
reviews.comment: After going through some comments, I was dissapointed. Here\'s what I did, stock ROM rooted, usb debugging enabled, it says \"no space\". I have been dying to increase my rom size but I just cant. My phones internal is 6GB and u install nova3 you you just sit until you remove it. Devs plz go and visit rehab or have fun with your fam while you can, pissing off users aint a good idea mate. JM2C
reviews.author: Abakash Palai

reviews.title: Comprehensive
reviews.comment: There\'re many \"move to SD\" apps but this one\'s sort/display options are a must for the download junkie ;)
reviews.author: Daniel Camargo

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy tab 2 7 0
reviews.comment: The developer\'s have clearly not gone out of their way to test this app on different platforms. .!   Until then, I\'ll stck to \"Clean Master\". For a cache cleaner the master is really a master for moving apps to sdc..!

reviews.title: Does not move
reviews.comment: A message comes up saying there is not enough space Can you tell me the roms which support app2sd

reviews.title: Soooo bad
